text: Shrek is the main character of the movie Shrek. He was first seen in the 1990 childrenâ€™s book Shrek! by William Steig. He is often seen as grumpy. He appears in all Shrek movies. He is voiced by Mike Myers. == References == Category:Shrek characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1990 Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2001
